From the brand

Compressed air duster – Eco-Friendly & Energy-Efficient：Alternative to canned air Compressed Air can be recharged and used repeatedly. It is more energy-efficient and environmentally than constantly buying canned air, save money, cordless air dusters electric is a onetime investment, you can have a permanent air duster electric.
Keyboard cleaner – Powerful deep cleaning：Wind power of the Cordless air duster Blowing force 1.86-2.51OZ .continuously provide high-pressure air to remove dust, Can produce super-strong airflow. Cleans debris and dust from any electronic device, handy in your home or office or car.
Compressed air – Multi-use to lots of places：Electric air blower can cleaning computer keyboard, laptop, camera, cleaning car, seat and blinds etc.Thin and long nozzle makes it easier to clean corners or place where hand cannot reach. Air dusters can even be used in products that need to be inflated, inflatable beds, lifeboats, etc.
Compressed air duster – Various brush head accessories nozzles：Cordless air duster electric nozzle is Light weight and small size, wireless design and comfortable to hold and space saving, convenient to carry around. Different cleaning sites, replace the appropriate accessories, with strong wind, cleaning is easier, and can be used multiple times.
Air duster – USB charging design：Compressed air dusters battery protection design, Do not charge when the machine just finished using, the battery temperature is too high, please wait ten minutes to cool down before charging. Compressed air dusters High-end simple new design, high technical configuration, with charging cable for use.If you have any questions about the use of the product, please contact us, we will solve it for you within 24 hours.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here. [PDF ]

Price: $180.71
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:56 UTC – Details)


The Panasonic Cordless Phone KX-TGF575S, with DECT 6.0 and Link2 Cell technology, answering system, dual keypad and 5 cordless phones handsets, allows you to link up to two cell or smart phones and integrate them into the telephone system via Bluetooth, no landline phone line required. All of your contacts stored into your cell or smart phone can be shared with this phone system allowing you access to important contacts right from the handset. Hear who’s calling from across the room without having to get up with text-to-speech announcements in English and Spanish from the base unit and cordless handsets in the home/home office. The Panasonic home phone with answering machine also features easy call block, speakerphone, voice paging, power back up operation and advanced TAD (telephone answering device) functions tie it all together making this system one of the most reliable and functional systems available in the market today. Do not overload power outlets and extension cords. This can result in the risk of fire or electric shock.
Expandable Panasonic Cordless Phone with Answering Machine: 5-handset home phone system with added features to keep you connected; Digital Answering Machine stores 18-min of messages
Interference-Free, Secure Phone Signal: DECT 6.0 wireless technology for whole home coverage and less interference from other electronics; ideal for homes and apartments with thick walls
Bluetooth Phone Connects to Cell and Voice Assistants: Make and receive calls from your cellular device with Link2Cell pairing up to 2 cell phones; connect handsets to Siri, Google Now and S Voice through Voice Assist feature
Bi-Lingual Talking Caller ID and Smart Call Blocker: Talking caller ID announces caller information in English or Spanish; block unwanted calls with the push of a button on telephone handset or main base unit
More Features to Enjoy: Handset to handset intercom and baby monitor function, battery back-up for up to 12-hr talk time when the power goes out, 3000-entry phone book, and more

Advanced Calling Made Easy

Improved five-handset system syncs two smartphones, connects to Siri, Google Now, and S Voice, blocks unwanted callers, includes Talking Caller ID, and a headset jack. Expandable up to six handsets.

Read more

Sync Two Smartphones

The simple push of a button links up to two smartphones to make and receive cell calls routed through your Link2Cell handsets. Advanced Class 1 Bluetooth extends calling range to 330 ft. to easily handle calling from both cell lines simultaneously.

Connect to Siri, Google Now and S Voice

When synced to your smartphone via Link2Cell, you can connect to Siri, Google Now, and S Voice anytime from your handsets with the Voice Assist feature. Simply press ‘Assist’ on the handset or base unit to send voice commands for making phone calls, checking new messages, weather and more, and hear the responses on the handset.

Block Bothersome Callers

With a dedicated Call Block button on each handset, it’s easy to block telemarketers, robocallers, and other unwanted caller numbers. One button registers up to 250 caller numbers — even while the phone is ringing or while you’re talking or listening.

Talking Caller ID

When the phone rings on one side of the room and you’re on the other, Panasonic’s advanced Talking Caller ID in English and Spanish and Text ID tell you who’s calling with text-to-speech announcements from speakers in the base unit and handsets.

Read more

Beyond Intercom

Wake kids for school in the morning and let everyone know when dinner is ready in the evening with Panasonic ‘s exclusive Voice Paging. More than a traditional intercom, VP makes it easy to send clear, simultaneous announcements to every handset in the house, even when family members don’t respond.

Power When the Power Goes Out with Low Battery Alert

Included rechargeable backup batteries keep you connected when the power goes out. With a fully charged handset in the base unit, you’ll have power for up to 12 hours talk time and 7 days standby for calls using other cordless handsets in the house.

Now, when any of your handsets are running low on power, the handsets alert you. And as an added convenience, a large, highly-visible battery status icon on the handset LCD lets you know as well.

Hear Calls from Noisy Places

Whether someone’s calling from a busy city street or a raucous room, Noise Reduction automatically suppresses background interference while also enhancing voice tones for clearer, more comfortable conversations.

Large Backlit Display

A large 1.8-inch high-contrast white backlit LCD and enlarged, easier to see and use dial keys and function control buttons make home and home office call management quicker and more convenient for everyone.

Read more

Additional Calling Conveniences

With the Panasonic KX-TGF575S system, you can program and store up to 3,000 numbers in your phonebook, and enjoy the time-saving convenience of nine speed dial settings and handset-to-handset intercom.

App Alert (for Android) :

Download the Panasonic Link2Cell app to stay informed and up to date via your smartphone, tablet and Link2Cell system. Receive SMS, email, calendar, low battery notice, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram notifications on your Link2Cell base unit and LCD handsets.

Accessories :

The KX-TGF575S base unit is wall-mountable and comes with matching wall bracket and screws. Two rechargeable AAA-size Ni-MH batteries plus a belt clip are also included.

What’s in the Box :

  • KX-TGF575S phone system base unit
  • 5 Cordless handsets
  • 4 Chargers
  • 5 Belt clips
  • Wall mount
  • 10 Rechargeable Ni-MH AAA-size batteries

Read more

Product Description

Power Tool Organizer

3 Quick and Easy Ways This Power Tool Orangizer Wall Mount Will Save Money, Time and Make You Money Even If Your Already the Best Tradesperson in the world!!

STOP WASTING MONEY: Made from ultra durable SPCC cold rolled steel, this power tool organizer is designed by professionals and is built to last which means you wont be wasting your hard earned money on fragile timber tool organizers!SAVE TIME: This power tool storage rack features 5 slots to hold cordless power tools, and 2 open shelves to keep your tools organized in one central location. No more wasting time looking through drawers , toolboxes and random places for your tools again which means you will have time to sit down and watch the game or spend more time with the kids!MAKE MORE MONEY: Holds up to 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½” and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and complete projects fast so you can get to your next customer/client!

WARNING : Do Not Even Consider Buying Another Power Tool Organizer Until You Read This:

HAPPY WIFE , HAPPY LIFE: Having your tools organized and ready to go at a moments notice for any project will allow you to complete those honey-do list jobs that you’ve been getting bugged about for months which means you will be in the good books and not the dog house!INCREDIBLE SUPPORT: Each exclusive tool storage shelf can support up to 66 pounds which means you’ll feel safe that your load and tools will always be supported!PROTECTION AGAINST DAMAGE: Featuring a high-quality powder-coated finish which helps you protect against damage and is easy to wipe clean !

The Perfect Solution If You Want To Look Like A Professional Tradesperson Even If You Are Just A Avid Do-It-Yourself’er :

ALL THE GEAR BUT NO IDEA ? : These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill rack features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!STRESS FREE INSTALLATION: This garage storage rack is so quick and easy to assemble even the most amateur DIY’ers can do it with ease! Fewer screws are needed compared to other ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!WHAT’S INCLUDED:(1) x Steel Tool OrganizerAssembly HardwareWall Mounting HardwareAssembly Instructions

Steel
TOOLGANIZE YOUR GARAGE: Enjoy unsurpassed shop organization with the Toolganize Power Tool Storage Organizer. Keep all of your tools organized in one central location which means you’ll never be wasting time looking for your tools again!
DESIGNED BY TRADESMEN , BUILT FOR STRENGTH : Made from powder-coated SPCC cold rolled steel for heavy duty strength and durability, this wall tool organizer is designed by professionals to last which means you wont be wasting your money on fragile timber tool organizers!
ROOM FOR ALL YOUR TOOLS: This garage tool organizer has 2 solid shelves, 5 drill holder slots for cordless power tools, holds 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½”, and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools Which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and get your jobs done faster!
FLAT PACKED & EASY TO ASSEMBLE: This garage storage rack is quick and easy to assemble! The garage tool organizer wall mount needs fewer screws than ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!
ALL THE GEAR AND NO IDEA?: These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill racks features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

From the brand

HARDELL is a professional tools manufacturer. Whether you are a professional craftsman, a DIY enthusiast, or a modeling enthusiast in need of precision gadgets and miniature tools, HARDELL’s tools can help you.

Mini Cordless Rotary Tool

Rotary Tool Kits

Rotary Tool & Engraver

【Multipurpose Rotary Tool Set】The high-performance and low-noise rotary tool combined with 55 most popular power rotary tool accessories for DIY fine work, Not for Heavy-duty Projects. Whenever you think of carving, sanding, grinding, polishing or cutting, you’ll find this electric rotary unit is a must for creating your resin crafts. Owning one is like having a whole toolbox
【5-Speed Setting】The cordless rotary tool can realize 5-speed adjustment(5000/7000/9000/12000/15000 RPM),which makes it easier to adjust to a suitable speed to meet the power demand in different scenarios. It allows you to sand in stages safely and carefully. Even people without any experience can easily get started and control the speed easily. Micro rotary tool make your creation handy
【Compact Lightweight】Powerful but small and light, just like holding a pen while in use, for ultimate control and precision as well as for comfort
【Quick USB Charging, Longer Running Time】Rotary tool cordless comes with 3.7V rechargeable battery, can work continuously for 200 minutes. One charge can be used for multiple times, and the range is stress-free. Battery powered rotary tool make your work one after another. (The indicator light will turn green when it is fully charged)
【Rotary Drill with LED Indicator】The upgraded small cordless rotary tool has a blind spot lighting LED design. Reduce backlight shadows and overcome the adverse effects of dark areas on the use of the drill for resin, and provide you with a better experience


HARDELL MINI Rotary Tool is lightweight and small, you can carry it with you. It is suitable for different DIY working situation

  • Product Features：

  1. Cordless design: Cordless design of the rotary tool allows use anywhere without the need for an electrical outlet.
  2. USB Charging: Equipped with a USB power cord, making charging easier and more convenient.
  3. Spindle Lock: Onboard spindle lock makes for quick and easy bit changes.
  4. Variable Speed Tool: With 5 different levels of RPM, which can be adjusted among 5000 to 15000 RPM.
  5. Easy-to-use: You can grip it like a pen for ultimate control and precision as well as for comfort. Ergonomic streamlined design with over-load power-off protection for safe and reliable operation.

  • Application：

Fit for grinding pet nails and detailed works like sanding, polishing, carving, cutting.

  • Product Contents：

3.7v Cordless Rotary Tool and 55 Accessories(include USB)


Cordless Rotary Tool with 55 pcs Accessories

What you will get:

  • Cordless Rotary Tool x1
  • Sanding Bands x28
  • Grinding Bits x5+ Diamond Bits x5
  • Collets x6 + Mandrels x2
  • Polishing Wheels x2 + Twist Drill Bit x4 + Cutting Disc x2
  • Accessories Case x2
  • USB Cable x1
Warning

  1. Not for Heavy-duty Projects
  2. Do not press the lock button until the tool fully stops, or it may cause damage or even injury.
  3. Please refer to the instruction manual for a detailed operation guide.

Very useful for arts and crafts projects and small home repairs and are excellent for working in small or hard-to-reach spaces

Specifications

  • 1. Rating: 3.7V
  • 2. 5-Speed: 5000/7000/9000/12000/15000 RPM (no load)
  • 3. Color: Orange
  • 4. Collet Size: 0.5/1/1.5/2/2.4/3.0/3.2mm diameter
  • 5. Charging Port: Micro USB
  • 6. Tool Weight: 0.135kg
  • 7. Tool Size: 3.4*17.5CM

Read more





5 Rotation Speed

5 Rotation Speed controlled, you can make the speed control finely by adjusting the tool to better complete the job.

USB Charging

Rechargeable via supplied compatible USB connector at any place, more convenience for your charging. Full charging time is about 2-4 hours, and the indicator light will turn green when it is fully charged.

Easy to Use

The cordless tool with 7 different sizes compatible collet and spindle lock allows you to quickly and easily change accessories on Rotary tools. (Please make sure the bits are fixed in the rotary tool every time)

Light & Small

Powerful but small and light, like holding a pen when using.

Read more

Installation Instructions


Application




Sanding

Sanding belts and sanding discs can help your handmade crafts become smoother and smooth out the uneven surface of crafts. Such as steel rust, paint and rough wooden boards can be removed by the sanding rotary tool.

Carving

It is very easy to use for accurate DIY craft engraving on glass, wood, metal, plastic, mirrors, and other materials. You can engrave any pattern you like to create a unique gift for your family and friends.

Drilling

This Cordless Rotary Tool can be used for diamond drilling. Different sizes of drill bits and special cutting heads allow you to work easily on wood.

Read more




Polishing

Mini Rotary tools can help you remove rust from some metal surfaces. polishing Wheel and Abrasive Stone are suitable for polishing various materials. Reduce the surface roughness of the product to make its surface bright and flat.

Grinding

You can easily remove rust and polish the metal surface of the object to make the handwork more perfect.

Cutting

Suitable for cutting only light and small projects. Easy to cut plastics, wood, housings, and aluminum brass, etc.

Read more

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

With the VTech IS8251-5 5-Handset Cordless Phone featuring the industry’s largest 5″ color base display, managing your communication has never been easier. Assign shortcuts on the large disply for quick access to features that are important to you and easily view all the releveant information from messages left on the answering system. With and Smart Call Blocker, you won’t have to worry about unwanted calls waking you up in the middle of the night or tying up the line. Robocalls are automatically blocked from ever ringing through—even the first time. You can also permanently blacklist any number you want with one touch. Bluetooth Connect to Cell technology on this cordless phone system lets you receive cell and/or landline calls from one home phone system. With a touch of a button, enjoy the high-tech benefits your smart phone offers. Even if your smart phone is in a different room, you can still access Siri or Google Now from the cordless handsets. Place a call, write or read a text and perform all the other actions these services offer.
[Business-grade Cordless Phone built for ease of use at home] VTech IS8251 cordless brings excellent clarity and range, ensuring highest quality in voice communications for business or private calls. Featuring 5″ color base display, large icons, soft keys for seamless call management. Programmable short-cuts for quick access to phone functions that are important to you.
[Enhance efficiency] One-touch access to important contacts; One-touch to call back the caller from listed message or call history; Timer function to help you split your time doing tasks more efficiently.
[Never missed a call] An Virtual 2-line system manages calls from landline and cell-line simonteniously. Pair up to 2 cell phones or one cell phone and one Bluetooth headset for use with landline calls.
[Advanced Digital Answering System] The 5″ color base LCD displays the caller information of the message received, allows you to choose who to listen first from the message list displayed. Extra long 40 mins recording time ensuring all incoming messages captured.
[Smart Call Blocker] Say goodbye to unwanted calls. Robocalls on your landline are automatically blocked from ever ringing through—even the first time.
[Caller ID Announce] The handset and base announce the name of the caller, so you don’t have to scramble for the handset to see who’s calling. With the 5″ base display the caller details are visible more clearly even from farther away


Read more




  • Screen – the system prevents robocalls from interrupting your day by filtering all calls (from landline) before your phone rings.
  • Approve – avoid unwanted calls by requiring callers (from landline) to identify themselves, allowing you to decide if you want to answer.
  • Star Name List – add friend/family’s name, and the exact name of the trusted organization, into the list to ensure their calls will ring through.
  • Block – you can also block nuisance callers (from landline or cell-line) on the spot with the Call Block button in the base or handset. Add the intruder’s number to the Block List so they will be blocked permanently.

With the VTech IS8121-2 2-Handset Expandable Cordless Phone featuring, Super Long Range, Bluetooth Connect to Cell and Smart Call Blocker, you won’t have to worry about unwanted calls waking you up in the middle of the night or tying up the line. Robocalls are automatically blocked from ever ringing through—even the first time. You can also permanently blacklist any number you want with one touch. With up to 2300 feet or range, you can be on a call anywhere in your home, yard, or even your neighbors home. Bluetooth Connect to Cell technology on this cordless phone system lets you receive cell and/or landline calls from one home phone system. With a touch of a button, enjoy the high-tech benefits your smart phone offers. Even if your smart phone is in a different room, you can still access Siri or Google Now from the cordless handsets. Place a call, write or read a text and perform all the other actions these services offer.
** SUPER LONE RANGE UP TO 2300 FEET ** Experience the best in long-range coverage and clarity, provided by a unique antenna design and advances in noise-filtering technology. With over 2000 feet or range, you can be on a call anywhere in your home, yard, or even your neighbors home.
** SMART CALL BLOCKER ** Say goodbye to unwanted calls. Robocalls on your landline are automatically blocked from ever ringing through – even the first time. You can also permanently blacklist any number you want with one touch on the delicated key on the handset. The call block directory can store up to 1,000 name and number entries.
** BLUETOOTH CONNECT TO CELL ** Make and receive calls from your cellular plan while enjoying the comforts of a home phone. Pair up to 2 cell phones and connect 2 cell phones, or one cell phone and one BLUETOOTH headset for use with landline calls. With a touch of a button, enjoy the high-tech benefits your smart phone offers. Even if your smart phone is in a different room, you can still access Siri or Google Now from the cordless handsets. Place a call, write or read a text and perform all the other actions these services offer.
** DIGITAL ANSWERING SYSTEM WITH VOICE GUIDE ** This cordless system includes a digital answering machine that has a LED message counter, and records up to 22 minutes of incoming messages, outgoing announcements and memos. A built-in voice guide can help you to set up the system easily.
** LARGE 2-INCH SCREEN, BIG TEXT, LIGHTED KEY PAD ** High-contrast text on the extra-large 2 inch screen makes it easy to read incoming caller ID or call history records. Plus, the enlarged font and extra-large and lighted handset keypad allows for easy dialing in low-light conditions. This feature is especially helpful for those who are visually impaired.
** SPEAKERPHONE and VISUAL RINGER ** This cordless system has built-in a full-duplex speakerphone on handset allowing both ends to speak – and be heard – at the same time for conversations that are more true to life. Also designed with a lighted up visual ringer on top of the handset for noisier environments, or for those with weakened hearing.

Read more

Greater Mobility

Experience the best in long-range coverage and clarity, provided by a unique antenna design and advances in noise-filtering technology. With over 2000 feet of range, you can be on a call anywhere in your home, yard, or even your neighbors home.

Smart Call Blocker

Enjoy more peace of mind at home with the Smart Call Blocker, a screening tool built-in the IS8121. With one time set up, the system will carry out your commands automatically.

  • Screen - the system prevents robocalls from interrupting your day by filtering all home calls (from landline) before your phone rings.
  • Approve - avoid unwanted calls by requiring callers (from landline) to identify themselves, allowing you to decide if you want to answer.
  • Star Name List - save callers like friends and family, your trusted organization to the phonebook, so they are always allowed through.

You can also block nuisance callers (from landline or cell-line) on the spot by pressing the Call Block key. Add the intruder's number to the block list so they will be blocked permanently.

Connect to Cell

By connecting your mobile phone with Bluetooth technology, this system allows you to make and receive calls from your cellular plan and landline while enjoying the comforts of a home phone system. It is particularly helpful for those who experiencing signal dead spots at home. By placing the paired cell phone at where it has stronger reception, then use the cordless handsets to make and receive calls. Even if your cell phone is in a different room, you can still place a call, write or read a text, access Siri or Google Now from the cordless handsets. Note: Bluetooth wireless technology operates within a short range (approximately 15 feet) from the telephone base. Please keep connected cell phones and headsets within this range for optimum performance.

Virtual 2-Line Phone

This system's Bluetooth Connect to Cell integrates your cell phone for your calls at home, with or without a landline. Compatible with Bluetooth version 2.0 or above devices, you can pair up two cell devices (cell phone or Bluetooth headset), and connect one cell device to be used with landline calls at the same time. Perfect for busy family where one handset can support a landline call while the other handset on a cell-line call. If you are using Android phones (OS 2.3 or higher), you can further extend the flexibility of your telephone system with use of the free Connect To Cell application. VTech Connect to Cell comprises Caller ID manager and Alerts manager that help integrate your cell with your telephone system. Note: for optimal performance of the cordless system, keep the cell device charged and located within 15 feet of the telephone base. Your cell phone’s battery discharges faster while it is connected to the telephone base via Bluetooth wireless technology.

Digitally record up to 22 minutes of incoming messages, outgoing announcements, and memos. They system allows for instant playback, selective save or delete, and skipping or repeating messages from the handset and base.

  • 1000 Call Block Directory
  • 1000 Phonebook Directory
  • 50 Caller ID History

2" backlit display and high contrast text makes it easy to read incoming caller ID or call history records. Plus, the lighted handset keypad allows for easy dialing in low light conditions.

Enjoy more true to life conversations with the high quality full-duplex speakerphone built-in on each handset.

Read more

  • Visual Ringer
  • Redial Button
  • Mute Button
  • Quiet Mode

Expandable to 5 handsets using IS8102 accessory handset (sold separately).

Read more

Product Description

Lzeodo

The Lzeodo is an enterprise specializing in the production and selling of power tools holder. We are committed to providing excellent products and services. Feel free to contact with us, if you have any problems of this power tools storage. We will try our best to solve any problems for you within 24 hours.

LZEODO POWER TOOL ORGANIZER

SPECIFICATIONS

Drill Organizer Rack*1

Wrench *1

Screws *12

Screws Nut *12

Screwdriver Holder *2

Expansion Nails Plug *3

Expansion Nails *2

The upper layer used to storage tools and hand drills. The middle layer is for charging stations, battery, tool box etc. The 4 drill hanging slots are for power drills, saws etc. The side racks are for pliers and hammers.

Screwdriver Organizer

There are more than 10 holes in the tool rack, which can store screwdrivers of different sizes. Very convenient for your access.

Easy to Assemble

Just need to connect the gauge steel wire and plating with screws and hang it on the wall according to the instructions.

4 Drill Holders

Friendly design with 4 drill holders. It can store cordless drills, brush less drills,small corded drills,impact driver drills.

MADE FOR MOST TOOL ORGANIZATION: This tool organizer adopts unique multifunctional storage design with 15 holes for screwdrivers holder, 4 racks for pliers storage and two flat shelves to place other power tools. This tool storage helps you keep all your commonly used project tools neatly organized and within your arm’s reach.
THICKEN HEAVY-DUTY MATERIAL: Compared with other utility racks which made of thin wire, our drill holder has greater bearing capacity. It is made of thicken heavy compact steel metal, and the joint of the shelf uses a reinforced design. This shelf is strong enough to withstand a person of 50kgs.
REMOVABLE AND EASY TO INSTALL: The power tool organizer has a simple structure and easy to move. It comes with wrench, drywall anchors and pan head screws. It takes only a few minutes to install it, just need to drill holes and install screws. The installation guide is provided for you to check.
WIDE RANGE OF USES: Our power tool organizer wall mount is perfect to organize all kinds of garage stuff. And it’s widely used as screwdriver organizer, electric drill charging station and Father’s Day gift. It’s suitable for garage, tools room warehouse and so on due to its perfect size.
SATISFACTION SERVICE: Feel free to contact with us, if you have any problems of this drill holder wall mount. We will try our best to solve any problems for you within 24 hours. And we offer a 1-year guarantee on this product. Don’t worry about it.

Lzeodo
